imdb.plot outline: Qigong for stress relief features different systems of Qigong that follow the basic tenants and principles of this great practice - including focused breathing, visualization techniques, posture, and specific body movements. The unique part of Qigong is that the exercises not only strengthen and heal the body; they also strengthen and heal the mind, balance the emotions, and boost your overall energy level.
imdb.title: Gaiam: Qigong for Stress Relief
plot: Qigong for stress relief features different systems of Qigong that follow the basic tenants and principles of this great practice - including focused breathing, visualization techniques, posture, and specific body movements.
